title: Team builder not counting towards normal wins.
body: Currently, Team builder does not cont as a normal win . I have contacted player support and they replied saying to post on threads to make the development team notice me. Pls comment and vote in my poll.

replies.body: No. There is a simple reason to it: Teambuilder is an entirely different queue to normal.
Actually no. Ages ago they fixed it and now Team Builder wins add on to your normal wins.

I don't see how that's relevant to me expressing my opinion on whether it *should* work that way. Also I'm not aware of TB games counting towards normal wins, it doesn't work that way for me and some of my friends. Are you sure that info is accurate?

I am sure. Check your Normal wins on your profile and then go play a Team Builder match and win it, and you will see that it has gone up by 1. They fixed this many many many patches ago, I had to really search for proof of the fix.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-48-notes#patch-team-builder
I see. Will have to check if it's working for me at some point.
Team Builder wins do count as Normal wins. Not sure what is wrong with your account.
